description: This file sets up a knowledge base with a PDF URL, initializes an agent with a language model, and queries the agent for cooking instructions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a language model and knowledge base.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads content from a PDF URL.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating its contents.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally in markdown.
